wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.core.operation.convolve

Interface ConvolutionBase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinomialBlurGeneric, ConvolutionBaseGeneric, ConvolutionDifferentialGeneric, DifferentialOperatorGeneric, GaussianBlurGeneric, GaussianBlurIJ

    public interface ConvolutionBase
    Author:
    remy This is a base class for convolution masks and smoothing masks. Those include smoothing and differential operators. The class is intended to allow for integer only calculation and lazy computation, especially when composing masks, where masks with integer only implementation are applied when required by risk of overflow.

    • Method Detail

      • getImageConvolved

        ImageCore getImageConvolved(ConvolutionNormalizationPolicy normalizationPolicy)
        Allows to apply the mask on the image data and to normalize the results according to some policy. The policy can aim at accuracy of the results, maximizing contrast, or preservation of the values of an integer mask as is (without dividing by the weight of the mask).
        Parameters:
        normalizationPolicy - The policy for normalizing the results.
        Returns:
        The resulting image with the convolution applied, as well as a normalization policy.
        See Also:
        ConvolutionNormalizationPolicy

      • getInImageSignPolicyEmbed

        ImageSignPolicyEmbed getInImageSignPolicyEmbed()
        Allows to retrieve the input image without any normalization.
        Returns:
        The embedded image in this current state.

      • getCroppedInImage

        ImageCore getCroppedInImage()
        Allows to retrieve the input image without any normalization.
        Returns:
        The embedded image in this current state.

      • getOutImageSignPolicyEmbed

        ImageSignPolicyEmbed getOutImageSignPolicyEmbed()
        Allows to retrieve the output image without any normalization.
        Returns:
        The embedded image in this current state.

      • getNormalizationDenominator

        int getNormalizationDenominator()
        Getter to retrieve value of the value for the Convolution Mask's common denominator factor
        Returns:
        The Convolution Mask's common denominator factor

      • getMaskMass

        int getMaskMass()
        Getter to retrieve value of the value for the Convolution Mask's common denominator factor. Same as getNormalizationDenominator()
        Returns:
        The Convolution Mask's total mass (sum of the coefficients)

      • composeWith

        ConvolutionBase composeWith(ConvolutionBase rightHandSide)
        Allows to create a mask by composing two masks one after another on an image.
        Parameters:
        rightHandSide - The mask to compose with this mask.
        Returns:
        A mask which, when applied on an image, consists in

      • applyMask

        ConvolutionBase applyMask()
        Allows to Convolve the mask of this instance with the image underlying this instance. This is done by embedding the image (if necessary) and storing it in an attribute, which can then be retrieved after normalization. Note that this operation might become protected (and therefore removed from this interface) in the future because its use might be obscure and lead to errors.
        Returns:
        The reference to this instance to allow for use of the cascade pattern.
